pages.text: The $(mob)Satyress$() is a neutral monster that spawns in Plains and Mesa of the $(thing)Overworld$(). It will not attack players unless provoked, at which point it engages in melee, inflicting $(thing)Slowness$() on hit. When reduced below 25% health, a $(mob)Satyress$() will flee from combat to recover health before resuming the attack.
$(mob)Satyresses$() drop $(item)Meat$() on death, which serves as a decent source of food.

$(mob)Satyresses$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
